steps.step1: Clients can submit orders online and/or via telephone. It is recommended that clients conduct a simulation first before using {realtrading}.
steps.step2: Clients who submit orders online will receive a {userid} and {password} from PT. Rifan Financindo Berjangka.
steps.step3: To conduct online transactions, the following requirements must be met:

requirements.credentials: Client already has a {userid} and {password} from PT. Rifan Financindo Berjangka.
